---
title: "Analyzing Yugoslav War Data"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library('tidyverse')
```

```{r}
#loading the csv file
deaths <- read_csv('yugoslavia_death_data.csv')
```

```{r}
ggplot(deaths) +
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = date, y = deaths)) + 
  ggtitle("Number of deaths per reported incident")
  ggsave("plot_death_date.png")
```
